courseSection1.text20: FIL3880C - Images of Women in Film (3)

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours must be earned at UCF: At least 12 hours must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit exam (TSD, Military credit) ma: No credit exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, Independent Study cre: Internship, Co-op, Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Total Undergraduate Credit Hours Required: 18

Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
